answers.answer: I am a volunteer on this site and a diabetic.  Do you have diabetes as well?  I am not sure if you are asking a question pertaining to diabetes.  If so maybe you could elaborate.  I have no knowledge pertaining to breathing machines.

question: I have been having breathing problems in the nightime hours.  I awake clenching fists and beating on my chest to open my lungs in an effort to breath.  I have spent time in the hospital to no avail.  I was only diagnosed with hypertension and was told I may have had a heart attack.  While in the hospital I was given oxygen.  I am wondering if possibly need and oxygen device for my home at night.  I can not recall the name of the breathing machine, starts with an N*.  Thanks for any advice.
title: Breathing Problems
